ExtensionDesc.message: Chromerly is a simple url-shortener extension, just click the icon to shorten current url or use the omnibox keyword url to shorten what ever you wish. This is my first extension. :)

FailGeneral.message: Failed to shorten. I'm terribly sorry, try again later!

FailLimit.message: Failed to shorten, your shortening quota is depleted!

FailFormat.message: Failed to shorten, check your input!
